challenges.title: Workit landing page
challenges.resume: This HTML and CSS-only landing page will be an excellent test of your UI and responsive skills. There’s also some fun to be had creating the curved section borders!

challenges.title: Results summary component
challenges.resume: This challenge has something for everyone. It’s a HTML and CSS only project, but we’ve also provided a JSON file of the test results for anyone wanting to practice JS.

challenges.title: Product preview card component
challenges.resume: This HTML & CSS-only challenge will be perfect for anyone starting to build responsive projects.

challenges.title: Skilled e-learning landing page
challenges.resume: This responsive page is perfect if you've learned the fundamentals of HTML & CSS, completed a couple of smaller projects, and want to take it up a notch.

challenges.title: Interactive rating component
challenges.resume: This is a nice, small project to practice handling user interactions and updating the DOM. Perfect for anyone who has learned the basics of JavaScript!

challenges.title: QR code component
challenges.resume: A perfect first challenge if you're new to HTML and CSS. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's ideal if you haven't learned about building responsive layouts yet.

challenges.title: NFT preview card component
challenges.resume: This HTML & CSS only challenge is perfect for anyone just starting out or anyone wanting a small project to play around with.

challenges.title: Equalizer landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge will be a perfect test of your HTML & CSS skills. If you're starting to get comfortable building smaller projects, this will be a great step up.

challenges.title: Order summary component
challenges.resume: A perfect project for newbies who are starting to build confidence with layouts!

challenges.title: Stats preview card component
challenges.resume: This is a great small challenge to help get you used to building to a design. There's no JS in this project, so you'll be able to focus on your HTML & CSS skills.

challenges.title: Meet landing page
challenges.resume: This HTML & CSS only challenge is perfect if you're starting to get a bit comfortable with your layout skills. The responsive layout shifts will also be a great test!

challenges.title: 3-column preview card component
challenges.resume: This challenge is perfect if you're just getting started. The shift between the layouts will be a nice test if you're new to building responsive projects.

challenges.title: Pod request access landing page
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building out an early access landing page that includes custom form validation.

challenges.title: Profile card component
challenges.resume: This is a perfect challenge to test your layout skills. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's also great for those that haven't dived into responsive websites yet!

challenges.title: FAQ accordion card
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building out an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's a great opportunity to get some practice in!

challenges.title: Social proof section
challenges.resume: This project will test your layout skills. If you're starting to get confident with Flexbox or Grid, this will provide a nice challenge!

challenges.title: Article preview component
challenges.resume: Practice your layout skills with this article preview component. There's lots of fun to be had playing around with animations for the sharing icons as well.

challenges.title: Four card feature section
challenges.resume: A nice layout-based challenge for beginners. This will test anyone who is new to multi-column and responsive layouts.

challenges.title: Base Apparel coming soon page
challenges.resume: This layout looks simple enough, but there are some interesting details to it that will test your CSS skills. You'll also get to practice basic form validation.

challenges.title: Intro component with sign-up form
challenges.resume: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.

challenges.title: Single price grid component
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you will build out the pricing component to the designs provided. This is perfect for beginners and people who want to complete a smaller challenge.

challenges.title: Ping single column coming soon page
challenges.resume: This challenge is great for beginners and offers a chance to practice basic client-side form validation.

challenges.title: Huddle landing page with a single introductory section
challenges.resume: A perfect challenge for beginners, this project will get you working with a two column layout.

challenges.title: Age calculator app
challenges.resume: This challenge is designed to sharpen your JavaScript and form validation skills. Working with dates in JavaScript can be tricky, so this will be a nice test!

challenges.title: Single-page developer portfolio
challenges.resume: Test your HTML and CSS skills with this portfolio site. Basic JS knowledge is needed for the form validation. You can even customize and use this as your own site!

challenges.title: News homepage
challenges.resume: This news homepage will be an excellent opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. There will be lots of tricky decisions to make and plenty of learning opportunities!

challenges.title: Notifications page
challenges.resume: This project will be a brilliant test of your HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript skills. You'll use JS to toggle the visual state of the notifications.

challenges.title: Interactive card details form
challenges.resume: This fun project will be an excellent way to practice DOM manipulation and form validation while also putting your HTML and CSS skills to the test.

challenges.title: Single-page design portfolio
challenges.resume: This project will test your layout skills, especially in making the site fully responsive. The skills grid is a perfect chance to practice CSS Grid.

challenges.title: Expenses chart component
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll create a bar chart component from scratch. We provide a local JSON file, so you can add the chart data dynamically if you choose.

challenges.title: Intro section with dropdown navigation
challenges.resume: This challenge will test your ability to create dropdown navigation menus, a common pattern on larger sites. It will also provide some nice basic layout challenges.

challenges.title: Advice generator app
challenges.resume: The perfect project if you're learning how to interact with rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

challenges.title: Suite landing page
challenges.resume: This small-ish HTML and CSS only landing page includes some interesting layout decisions. Perfect if you want to put your layout and responsive skills to the test!

challenges.title: Art gallery website
challenges.resume: This two-page art gallery project will be perfect if you're ready to branch out beyond single landing pages. There are some particularly interesting layout challenges!

challenges.title: Time tracking dashboard
challenges.resume: A perfect opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. For anyone wanting to take it up a notch, we provide a JSON data file to practice working with data.

challenges.title: GitHub user search app
challenges.resume: In this project, you'll use the GitHub users API to pull profile data and display it. It's a great challenge if you're looking to practice working with a 3rd-party API.

challenges.title: Tip calculator app
challenges.resume: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

challenges.title: Sunnyside agency landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge will be a perfect test of your layout and responsive skills. There's a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu, but the focus is HTML & CSS.

challenges.title: Typemaster pre-launch landing page
challenges.resume: This project will be a perfect opportunity to put your CSS Grid skills to the test. The layout shifts from mobile, to tablet, to desktop will also be a nice challenge.

challenges.title: Blogr landing page
challenges.resume: Flex your layout muscles with this landing page challenge. You'll mostly be working with HTML & CSS for this project with a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu.

challenges.title: Crowdfunding product page
challenges.resume: This challenge will test both your layout and state management skills. As visitors make pledges, your goal is to keep track of the changes.

challenges.title: Interactive pricing component
challenges.resume: In this project, you'll build out an interactive pricing component complete with custom range input slider and pricing toggle. A perfect way to test your JS skills!

challenges.title: Maker pre-launch landing page
challenges.resume: Put your layout skills to the test with this landing page challenge. The only JS you'll need will be for the custom form validation on the email input.

challenges.title: Loopstudios landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge is perfect if you're looking to test your CSS Grid chops. Even without Grid, this project will be a fun one to help you practice your layout skills!

challenges.title: Officelite coming soon site
challenges.resume: This -page challenge will be a perfect test if you're starting to get comfortable with your HTML & CSS skills. There are a couple of small bonus challenges too!

challenges.title: Testimonials grid section
challenges.resume: This challenge will be perfect practice for anyone wanting to test their CSS Grid skills. Grid is such a powerful addition to CSS, so it's worth getting to grips with it!

challenges.title: Fylo data storage component
challenges.resume: This component has some interesting CSS challenges in the design. If you're looking to test your CSS skills, this will be a great project for you!

challenges.title: Coding bootcamp testimonials slider
challenges.resume: This challenge will be a nice test if you're new to JavaScript. It's also a great opportunity to play around with content animations and transitions.

challenges.title: Social media dashboard with theme switcher
challenges.resume: This challenge will be a perfect chance to practice your Grid skills. The color theme switcher also adds a nice additional test.

challenges.title: Insure landing page
challenges.resume: Test your layout skills with this HTML & CSS only landing page. This challenge is perfect if you're starting to get confident in laying out web pages.

challenges.title: Pricing component with toggle
challenges.resume: This challenge will get you thinking about building an accessible custom toggle control and also test your layout skills.

challenges.title: Project tracking intro component
challenges.resume: Some interesting layout and code challenges are baked into this design. Perfect if you're a beginner who is starting to get a bit more confident with your layouts.

challenges.title: Clipboard landing page
challenges.resume: Put your layout skills to the test with this HTML & CSS landing page challenge. This challenge includes a design for hover states.

challenges.title: Huddle landing page with alternating feature blocks
challenges.resume: This challenge is perfect if you're wanting to practice your layout skills. If you're starting to get a bit more confident laying out a web page, give this project a go.

challenges.title: Fylo dark theme landing page
challenges.resume: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.

challenges.title: Fylo landing page with two column layout
challenges.resume: This project is great if you're starting to get confident with slightly more complex layouts. The second section with the testimonial area will provide a nice challenge.

challenges.title: Huddle landing page with curved sections
challenges.resume: Practice using pseudo-elements for styling extras and the CSS position property for the sections with curved edges.

challenges.title: Dictionary web app
challenges.resume: In this project, you'll integrate with the Dictionary API to create a real-world dictionary web app. Additional tests include colour themes and font selection.

challenges.title: Password generator app
challenges.resume: This app will be an excellent test of your HTML, CSS, and JS skills. You'll build custom form controls and use JavaScript to generate random passwords.

challenges.title: In-browser markdown editor
challenges.resume: In this project, you'll build a fully-functional in-browser markdown editor application with a light/dark mode toggle. It's also perfect to build as a full-stack app!

challenges.title: Tic Tac Toe game
challenges.resume: This classic practice project for web developers is a great exercise to complete. It will test your HTML semantics, your grid layout skill, as well as your JS logic.

challenges.title: Interactive comments section
challenges.resume: This is project will put your JavaScript skills to the test. We provide a JSON file to pull the data, but it's also a perfect project to build as a full-stack CRUD app!

challenges.title: Space tourism multi-page website
challenges.resume: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

challenges.title: E-commerce product page
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!

challenges.title: Galleria slideshow site
challenges.resume: This art gallery slideshow project will be a great test for your layout and JS skills. With the masonry layout, slideshow logic, and lightbox view there's a lot to build!

challenges.title: Planets fact site
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building out an 8-page fact site for all planets in our solar system. This project will make an incredible portfolio piece when completed!

challenges.title: Calculator app
challenges.resume: This calculator app will be a great test of your CSS and JS skills especially. If you're wanting to practice using Grid, this challenge will be perfect for you!

challenges.title: Coffeeroasters subscription site
challenges.resume: This challenge will have you building a 3-page subscription site. As part of the project, you'll create an interactive subscription page to test your JS and logic skills!

challenges.title: Launch countdown timer
challenges.resume: This will be a fun one! Your challenge is to build this countdown timer. There are lots of small CSS tests in the design as well. So it should keep you busy!

challenges.title: Creative agency single-page site
challenges.resume: This challenge will put your layout skills to the test with lots of overlapping elements. If you're getting confident with your CSS layouts, this will be a great project!

challenges.title: Todo app
challenges.resume: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop reordering for anyone wanting an extra test.

challenges.title: Clock app
challenges.resume: This challenge will have you working with external APIs to set data based on a visitor's location. You'll also be using logic to set content depending on the time of day.

challenges.title: Room homepage
challenges.resume: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.

challenges.title: IP Address Tracker
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be using two separate APIs together to create an IP Address Tracking app.

challenges.title: Chat app CSS illustration
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building out the entire app illustration from scratch. This will seriously test your CSS skills. So give it a go if you feel confident!

challenges.title: Scoot multi-page website
challenges.resume: This multi-page website will really test your front-end skills. There are 4 pages to build with mobile, tablet, and desktop designs included.

challenges.title: Dine restaurant website
challenges.resume: This two-page website is perfect if you're starting to become more confident in your front-end skills. The challenge includes tricky design details and form validation.

challenges.title: Minimalist portfolio website
challenges.resume: This multi-page portfolio site will be a great challenge to test your all-round front-end skills. You can even use the site as your own portfolio when you're finished!

challenges.title: Job listings with filtering
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be using JavaScript to filter out jobs based on selected categories. We provide a local JSON file to help you practice working with JSON data.

challenges.title: Easybank landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge will provide a nice test for your layout skills. If you're ready to move up from Junior challenges, this one is a great next step.

challenges.title: Manage landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge will be a great test for your responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

challenges.title: URL shortening API landing page
challenges.resume: Integrate with the shrtcode URL shortening API and play with browser storage in this landing page challenge.

challenges.title: Bookmark landing page
challenges.resume: This challenge will really test your layout skills. There are also areas that will require some JavaScript, such as the tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.

challenges.title: Multi-step form
challenges.resume: An excellent test for your form-building and JS skills, this project will pose many challenges along the way to completion.

challenges.title: Connect Four game
challenges.resume: Your JS knowledge will be challenged in this fun project, where you'll build a two-player game. You'll write the logic for the game and how to test for win conditions.

challenges.title: Entertainment web app
challenges.resume: This multi-page entertainment web app will have you working with JSON data, routing, state management, and search functionality.

challenges.title: Memory game
challenges.resume: This project will be an excellent test for your HTML, CSS, and JS skills! You'll be building a fun memory game where players try to match pairs.

challenges.title: Pomodoro app
challenges.resume: This Pomodoro app will provide some tricky challenges, including building a circular progress bar. You'll also build a range of customizations, like colors and fonts.

challenges.title: Devjobs web app
challenges.resume: Build a jobs board that pulls data from a local JSON file. This is a great opportunity to practice JS and get to grips with a framework/library of your choice!

challenges.title: PayAPI multi-page website
challenges.resume: This 4-page website will be a great test for your HTML & CSS skills. You'll be building out a marketing site, complete with custom form validation throughout.

challenges.title: Photosnap multi-page website
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building the marketing site for a photo-sharing app. This will be a perfect opportunity to put your CSS Grid skills to the test!

challenges.title: Arch Studio multi-page website
challenges.resume: In this challenge, you'll be building a 4-page site that will look great in any portfolio. You'll even get the chance to play with mapping APIs if you choose the bonus.

challenges.title: Myteam multi-page website
challenges.resume: This challenge will give you a real glimpse into a professional front-end developer's workflow. It includes designs for a 3-page fully-functional website.

challenges.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors game
challenges.resume: This challenge will test your HTML, CSS and JavaScript skills. There's even a Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock version if you really want to challenge yourself.

challenges.title: REST Countries API with color theme switcher
challenges.resume: If you're wanting to test your JavaScript skills this is the challenge for you. Use whichever JS framework you prefer and pull data from the REST Countries API.

challenges.title: Kanban task management web app
challenges.resume: In this project, you'll build a fully-functional task management app with a light/dark mode toggle. We provide a JSON file, so you can practice working with JSON data.

challenges.title: Product feedback app
challenges.resume: This will be a perfect portfolio piece! You'll be working with JSON, managing state, and building like a real-world app. You can even create it as a full-stack project!

challenges.title: Audiophile e-commerce website
challenges.resume: This huge e-commerce challenge will provide an incredible test for your front-end skills. Once you're done, you'll have an amazing project to add to your portfolio!

challenges.title: Invoice app
challenges.resume: This invoicing app project will test you on many levels. You'll be working with JSON data, managing state, plus a lot more. You can even build it out as a full-stack app!

challenges.title: Designo multi-page website
challenges.resume: This one's a BIG project! This challenge includes 5 different templates that make up a 7-page site. A perfect portfolio piece to show how you build multi-page websites!
